sourcesContent:
Memory

{{ jvmMemoryUsed.description }} ({{ jvmMemoryUsed.measurements[0].value / 1048576 | number: '1.0-0' }}M / {{ jvmMemoryMax.measurements[0].value / 1048576 | number: '1.0-0' }}M)
Committed : {{ jvmMemoryCommitted.measurements[0].value / 1048576 | number: '1.0-0' }}M
{{ jvmMemoryUsed.description }} {{ jvmMemoryUsed.measurements[0].value/ 1048576 | number: '1.0-0' }}M {{ (jvmMemoryUsed.measurements[0].value* 100) / jvmMemoryMax.measurements[0].value | number: '1.0-0' }}%-->
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import {EnvironmentInfo} from 'app/admin/metrics/metrics.model'; @Component({ selector: 'ic-jvm-memory', templateUrl: './jvm-memory.component.html', }) export class JvmMemoryComponent { /** * object containing all jvm memory committed */ @Input() jvmMemoryCommitted?: EnvironmentInfo; /** * object containing all jvm memory max */ @Input() jvmMemoryMax?: EnvironmentInfo; /* * object containing all jvm memory used */ @Input() jvmMemoryUsed?: EnvironmentInfo; /** * boolean field saying if the metrics are in the process of being updated */ @Input() updating?: boolean; }
